website_summaries.verdict: There's nothing groundbreaking about this simple system, but for basic small home security, it gets the job done.
pros: SkylinkNet's kit was a reliable performer in our tests, with responsive sensors and an easy-to-use app
cons: Skylink won't call the police for you if the alarm goes off, and its system won't integrate into a larger connected-home setup

customer_reviews.title: Great DIY Security System
customer_reviews.text: This is the second Skylink system. I bought the SK-200 for my house and now installed the similar SK-150 for my apartment. They are easy to set up and install. I've been monitoring my house for months now & the system works well. I can opt to get notifications on my iPhone & Apple watch. I called tech support because I thought my motion sensor wasn't working well. The tech representative was very nice & helpful. The motion sensor goes on the ceiling & not on the wall as I had placed it. Now it works well. I no longer pay a fortune for having my security system monitored.
customer_reviews.author: Techy Grandma

customer_reviews.title: A good investment to track Great Grandma with.
customer_reviews.text: Everything works as described; door senors real simple setup, motion sensor- also- wish the sensitivity could be adjusted, camera's- clear but no zoom, and all function as intended with setup and hub. Only complaint is about the password. You are asked to put it in but there's no defined diection as to what it is. We figured it out- random numbers on the router.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great little system
customer_reviews.text: Have this system for my home. Full setup took 39 minutes for garage door, 5 doors/windows and a lamp. Incredibly simple. Let’s me know via my iPhone when any are opened. Went on a week vacation and didn’t have to worry someone was at the house. Bought a set for my son’s apartment too. Use removable “command” type tape for sensors and the whole system can move with you from place to place.
customer_reviews.author: Figgette

customer_reviews.title: This is an excellent home security starter kit
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent home security starter kit. We have used it and tested it over the past 2 weeks. It works but....you need to know how all the pieces work and you are responsible for your setup and home security. This kit removes the "middle" man from the home security model. You set it up, you programs and place the pieces and you make sure it sends you notifications via Internet to cell phone. Make sure you have a UPS on your Internet/cable modem, router and Skylink hub. We are happy and it works.
customer_reviews.author: L.Antoinette Lewis

customer_reviews.title: GREAT mid range system
customer_reviews.text: Great little system, I have built my own sensors and used this as the base, I mixed the key fob type rfid to activate and deactivate alarm. I have purchased several of their sensors and found them well made and easy to use..
customer_reviews.author: Michael W.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome system. Well integrated thru IFTTT
customer_reviews.text: I love this and happy to have it. Recommend getting a blink camera or other camera with a mic to monitor the alarm better.
customer_reviews.author: G. E. Roquet

customer_reviews.title: Just as I expected!
customer_reviews.text: This is indeed a great product worth the investment. It arrived on time and with very clear instructions on how to configure. It works just as had been described by seller. I look forward to my next purchase.
customer_reviews.author: stephene otieno

customer_reviews.title: Excellent !!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Very flexible. Water sensor is a nice advantage.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: App Issue Makes It Unusable
customer_reviews.text: The app doesn't work correctly, and for us, it makes the alarm unusable. When one person in the family arms it, it doesn't show that its armed in the apps for everyone else. Because of that, it can't be disarmed by those family members. Other less critical complaints include the camera not recording when the alarm is triggered and the sensors having small stickers that cause the two sided installation tape to fall off. I've sent the details of the app problems to the alarm company, but they haven't addressed the problem yet. If the problem is fixed, I'll update this review.
customer_reviews.author: MysticKnight

customer_reviews.title: I tried using this on a trailer about 50 feet
customer_reviews.text: I tried using this on a trailer about 50 feet from house and did not work.
customer_reviews.author: Troy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best alarm you can get and easy to work with! You will love it
customer_reviews.author: Jorge A. Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and manage from the APP, still checking how to use with IFTTT
customer_reviews.author: Carlos I

customer_reviews.title: Bought this on recommendation of Cnet mag and good ratings here
customer_reviews.text: Bought this on recommendation of Cnet mag and good ratings here. Although the equipment seems to function, the app that governs it is garbage. It takes 5-7 attempts to open properly EVERY time the app closes. The app WILL NOT alert you if a zone trips, even with notifications selected. The app opened the camera once every dozen times I tried to open it to view area. Sent feedback with no reply, so customer service is as effective as the garbage app. There are better options out there...use them and stay away from this product. At least until they pull their head out and address the looming issues with the crappy app.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin R. Mattoon

customer_reviews.title: Just great !
customer_reviews.text: Just great, very easy to configure and install, simple interface. The only thing I miss is being able to determine times of activation / deactivation of alarms.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great reliable system. The app is very user friendly. Easy to install on your own.
customer_reviews.author: Bezan

customer_reviews.title: Movement sensor is to sensitive... it detects ...
customer_reviews.text: Movement sensor is to sensitive...it detects my 16lbs dog and it goes off constantly even when changing internal setting from 1 to 2. Had to disconnect it.
customer_reviews.author: jiguab

customer_reviews.title: The skylinknet alarm is pretty fantastic! I did not expect much given the ...
customer_reviews.text: The skylinknet alarm is pretty fantastic! I did not expect much given the price, but the hook up was simple, there is not monthly fees and I love how it works with IFTTT and third party devices. I even have it configured to call my landlord if the alarm goes off via IFTTT, which is pretty darn cool. The alerts are instant and work better than expected. The only downside to the product is that it would be fairly simple to unplug from the wall and disable. I guess by the time it is disabled, it has alerted you, but it sort of makes the siren a bit of a mute point.
customer_reviews.author: Emmett R.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic starter set very easy to set up. Highly recommend it!!!
customer_reviews.author: William Peterson

product_meta.title: SKYLINK SK-150 Basic Starter Kit Connected Wireless Alarm, Home Security System & Home Automation System, iOS iPhone Android Smartphone, Echo Alexa and IFTTT Compatible with No Monthly Fees, White
product_meta.description: All-In-One system with alarm, home control and video monitoring functions - protect your home the smart way! control & monitor your home from anywhere in the world with no monitoring fees. Works with echo with the Alexa skill, control the system with voice commands. Expandable system, have the freedom to add up to 100+ devices at anytime. Easy installation, plug & play. App available for iOS devices. Is if compatible, allowing you to integrate the system seamlessly with other manufacturer smart home devices. What's included in the kit: internet hub, 1 door/window sensor, 1 motion sensor, power Adapter, Ethernet cable and mounting accessories.
feature_bullets: Easy installation and do-it-yourself (DIY) no monthly fees. Arm & disarm the system and monitor the sensor status with the Skylink net smartphone app
Works with Amazon echo, with Alexa Skill. Use voice to control your alarm system and home automation devices
Skylink net is IFTTT compatible, allowing you to integrate the system seamlessly with other Manufacturer smart home devices. Works with Google home as well
Receive push notifications at anytime when sensor is activated. In case of power outage, backup batteries will provide additional protection and uninterrupted runtime.
Add up to 100 sensors, controllers for additional control. Add up to 10 security cameras to monitor different areas

specifications.Included Components: Internet Hub X 1Door/Window Sensor X 1Motion sensor X 1Power Adapter Ethernet CableMounting Accessories
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars68 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
